name: Mirror (itch) (lectvs)
description:
A relaxing, ambient puzzle platformer. Get yourself and your reflection to the end!

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 30.

Requires Java to play. Double-click the JAR to run the game.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - Move/Jump

Tech used:

  • Java
  • LWJGL library
  • The Slick library for loading resources
  • Paint.NET / GraphicsGale for sprite creation
  • FLStudio for music
